Class MarketInterface

Class that handles the interaction with the Market part of ESI, as well ass the handling of assets.

HandleOrders(String[], MarketInterface.SortBy, MarketInterface.SortOrder)

Handles the "orders" command. Finds all orders of the given type in the given location. If not location is given, the default region will be used
